solution_line_template: The carpenter made {tables_this_month} - {fewer_tables_last_month} = <<{tables_this_month}-{fewer_tables_last_month}={tables_last_month}>>{tables_last_month} tables last month.
So, the carpenter made {tables_this_month} + {tables_last_month} = <<{tables_this_month}+{tables_last_month}={total_tables}>>{total_tables} tables in all.
